definition: one of the parallel filaments projecting from the main shaft of a feather, to add barbs to something
details:
noun
- one of the parallel filaments projecting from the main shaft of a feather
- a subsidiary point facing opposite from the main point that makes an arrowhead or spear hard to remove
- the pointed part of barbed wire
- an aggressive remark directed at a person like a missile and intended to have a telling effect
= synonyms: shot, jibe, gibe, slam, shaft, dig
verb
- to add barbs to something
= example: to add barbs to something
